sentences.en: A corollary to the is the fear of failure in Europe.
sentences.cn: 阻碍欧洲人守业的真正理由是害怕失败的心里.

sentences.en: A corollary to this is the fear of failure in Europe.
sentences.cn: 阻碍欧洲人创业的真正原因是害怕失败的心理.

sentences.en: Blind jealousy is a frequent corollary of passionate love.
sentences.cn: 热烈的爱情必然经常衍生出盲目的嫉妒.

sentences.en: But the corollary has been a lack of scruples about sending individuals to the continent.
sentences.cn: 结果是,英国人被引渡到国外也已经是不被顾忌.

sentences.en: By the corollary to Theorem 4.3, the origin is asymptotically stable.
sentences.cn: 根据定理4.3的推论, 原点是渐近稳定的.

sentences.en: Corollary 1 The product of a constant and an infinitesimal is an infinitesimal.
sentences.cn: 推论2有限个无穷小的乘积是无穷小.

sentences.en: Everything else in your professional career is but a corollary to this vital dedication.
sentences.cn: 你们职业生涯中的一切其他事情,都只是为了实现这个极其重要的目标.

sentences.en: The corollary could only be yet another distortion.
sentences.cn: 于是不免又多了一层歪曲.

sentences.en: The corollary is that productivity improves at companies a buy - out.
sentences.cn: 推论是,公司被收购后生产效率提高了.

sentences.en: The corollary of the experiment has reached the anticipant goal.
sentences.cn: 实验结果基本达到了预期目的.

sentences.en: The corollary of this concept is that the consumption of merit bads should be discouraged.
sentences.cn: 这个概念的推论是主张对“有价值的坏商品”的消费应加以限制.

sentences.en: The Good Management Corollary: A mature process cannot overcome unsound management.
sentences.cn: 优良管理推论: 弌个成熟菂过程不能解决管理不善菂问题.

sentences.en: The machine is a corollary equipment of the button machine.
sentences.cn: 本机是纽扣机的配套设备.

sentences.en: The number of prisoners increased as a corollary of the government's determination to combat violent crime.
sentences.cn: 政府决心打击暴力犯罪，其后果是囚犯数量增加了。

sentences.en: These two visions imply such enormous increases in productivity as a corollary to automation.
sentences.cn: 这两种观点都把劳动生产率的巨大提高看成是自动化的必然结果.

sentences.en: We have the following corollary to this principle.
sentences.cn: 由这个原理我们可以作如下推导.

trans.tran_en: something that is the direct result of something else
